title: ssh keys sometimes are not valid

content.raw:
Today I had to start 4 rounds before I could get one with 3 valid ssh keys  (sim, blue, and gold)

I got an error on creating the machine.

![error_creating_sshkey.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/ykbEq8/images/1807397850-error_creating_sshkey.png)

And then after waiting for the server to come up I got a bad tarball. 

 ![bad_tarball.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/ykbEq8/images/3268337358-bad_tarball.png)

This fist happened with blue and gold, the 2nd round was all 3 bad. The 3rd round the simulator was bad and the 4th round they were all good.

tftest, tftest2, tftest3 and tftest4 I left tftest running for an example in case someone wants to look at it while running.
content.html:
Today I had to start 4 rounds before I could get one with 3 valid ssh keys (sim, blue, and gold)

I got an error on creating the machine.

And then after waiting for the server to come up I got a bad tarball.

This fist happened with blue and gold, the 2nd round was all 3 bad. The 3rd round the simulator was bad and the 4th round they were all good.

tftest, tftest2, tftest3 and tftest4 I left tftest running for an example in case someone wants to look at it while running.
